attributes.action: Ban the inhumane conditions that poultry and other living creatures have to endure to provide cheap food for our nation of 'animal lovers'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recents events concerning bird flu have shown the dreadful lives these poor creatures live. They never see daylight, never breathe fresh air never have space. They are crammed together in their thousands is it any wonder disease spreads like wildfire? They are not thought of as living sentient beings only as 'things' to make money.Make Britain proud of its animal welfare PLEASE

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Chickens/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
